crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.title: Crystal Config
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.MIN_AGE.to: Determines for how many ticks a crystal must have existed until it can get destroyed by a player.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.ALWAYS_EXP: Crystals blown up by other explosions will cause explosions too.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.NEED_DOUBL: Brings back 1.12 behavior, where end crystals need two air blocks above to be placed.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.SMALL_ENTI: When placing a crystal only a 1x1x1 box above will be checked for intersecting entities, instead of 1x2x1.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.NO_AIR_PLA: Prevents blocks from being placed mid-air.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.crystal-t: Allows to customize a few crystal pvp related mechanics.
